description: Standing Offer – Structure Protection Specialist – Parks Canada Agency
full_summary:
# **Standing Offer – Structure Protection Specialist**

## **Call for Tenders**

The Parks Canada Agency has issued a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) solicitation to seek a Standing Offer – Structure Protection Specialist.

**Solicitation Number and Issue Date**: 

* Solicitation Number: 5P420-23-0377/A
* Issue Date: June 18, 2024

**Tender Closing Date and Time**: 

* July 9, 2024, at 04:00 PM EST

**Contract Period**: 
The term for making call-ups against the Standing Offer is for thirteen (13) months from the date of the Standing Offer to March 31, 2025.  The Standing Offer will be extended for a duration of not more than 26 months from the end of the aforementioned thirteen (13) month period to March 31, 2026.

## **Brief Description of Requirements**

Parks Canada requires a Contractor that will provide Structure Protection Specialist (SPS) services nationwide in various National Parks and Historic Sites on an as-required basis. The SPS is envisioned to provide services in strategic planning, coordination, implementation of fire management, maintenance, risk analysis, consultation to clientele, providing protective barriers, habitat fencing, facility sanitation, PNG pest control, crisis management, Damage Assessment Investigation, driving insured rates, various writing services under Fire Risk management services for emergency management. 

## **Communication**

Offers received via fax and email will be accepted as official, but based on strict technical criteria related to secure operation. Do not hesitate to contact the Contracting Authority for any query or clarification with the information given in the tender document.

## **Security Clearances**

A mandatory security requirement is required for any tenderer that wishes to be given the contract. Fingerprint-based security clearance will be carried out on required participants before entering the park premises. Applicants seeking a security clearance will be responsible for all costs required for these procedures.
